protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for interleukin-8 which is a powerful neutrophil chemotactic factor. Binding of IL-8 to the receptor causes activation of neutrophils. This response is mediated via a G-protein that activates a phosphatidylinositol-calcium second messenger system. Binds to IL-8 with high affinity. Also binds with high affinity to CXCL3, GRO/MGSA and NAP-2

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
